text: @HillaryClinton The Democrats and the fakenews media criticized Trumps travel ban and called him racist. Sadly most of the Covid-19 fatalities have occurred in sanctuary cities and states where Democrats are in control. Perhaps Korea doesnt have sanctuary cities run by Democrats
